front.title: IEEE Guide for Selection and Design of Aluminum Sheaths for Power Cables
front.abstract: Superseded by 635-2003. This standard outlines requirements and establishes design guidelines for the selection of aluminum sheaths for extra-high, high, medium-, and low-voltage cables. It establishes basic installation parameters for aluminum-sheathed cables. It also provides references to industry standards and codes incorporating design and installation requirements of aluminum-sheathed cables.
